question: It is easier to roll a stone up a sloping road than to lift it vertical upwards because
option1: work done in rolling is more than in lifting
option2: work done in lifting the stone is equal to rolling it
option3: work done in both is same but the rate of doing work is less in rolling
option4: work done in rolling a stone is less than in lifting it
answer: work done in rolling a stone is less than in lifting it
